name: One Frisbee
description:
long ago all dogs could play dogball in the open fields, but in this grim future only one frisbee remains. do you have what it takes to woof honk snort bork woof

controls: ArrowKeys and Z

dash into frisbee with Z to collect it. throw frisbee with Z if you wanna. first dog to dog wins.

play - normalmode
play - dogmode

codes:RainbowCemetery
arts+music: necktiedog.itch.io/
